chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?
items.plainText: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?

items.text: The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the LORD, and against his anointed, saying,
items.plainText: The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the LORD, and against his anointed, saying,

items.text: Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.
items.plainText: Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.

items.text: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord shall have them in derision.
items.plainText: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the Lord shall have them in derision.

items.text: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath, and vex them in his sore displeasure.
items.plainText: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath, and vex them in his sore displeasure.

items.text: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion.
items.plainText: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion.

items.text: I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.
items.plainText: I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.

items.text: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.
items.plainText: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.

items.text: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.
items.plainText: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.

items.text: Be wise now therefore, O ye kings: be instructed, ye judges of the earth.
items.plainText: Be wise now therefore, O ye kings: be instructed, ye judges of the earth.

items.text: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.
items.plainText: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.

items.text: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.
items.plainText: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.
